elements.name: C7_context
elements.title: Task C7
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Kallie has struggled to find her footing at our company. She's repeatedly turned in work product containing typos, grammar issues, and content mistakes. The good thing is that I trust that Kallie will make great strides moving forward to improve. Every time I give her feedback or mark up documents for her, she takes my comments very seriously and always does better the next time. I believe she has the will and desire to become a reliable member of our department.

Blue Whale
Kallie's work often contains errors, but she is highly receptive to feedback and improves with every correction, showing a strong will to succeed.


Red Panda
Kallie: Struggles (typos, grammar, content errors). Takes feedback seriously & improves. Has will/desire to become reliable.


Green Elephant
Kallie's work has consistent errors, but she's receptive to feedback and shows strong potential for improvement. Her dedication suggests she'll become a reliable team member.


Golden Fish
Kallie has had difficulty with work quality, showing repeated errors in writing and content. However, she responds well to feedback, improves consistently, and demonstrates strong willingness to grow. With continued support, she has the potential to become a reliable team member.

elements.name: C8_context
elements.title: Task C8
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Elliot Gray is a hard worker but delivers to a standard level. The group tasks he has undertaken with the team have always been to an adequate standard. What he lacks in momentum he makes up for in good work. He has shown that he is capable of holding his on, despite the circumstances.

Blue Whale
Elliot is a hard worker who delivers adequate, standard-level work. While lacking momentum, he is a capable and reliable member of the team.


Green Elephant
Elliot: Hard worker, delivers adequate/standard level. Lacks momentum but provides good work. Capable.


Golden Fish
Elliot is a consistent, capable, and reliable worker. He may lack momentum but delivers good, adequate work, even in challenging circumstances.


Red Panda
Elliot Gray is a reliable, hardworking employee who consistently delivers adequate results, particularly in group tasks. Though he lacks momentum at times, his steady performance and ability to hold his own under pressure demonstrate solid capability and dedication.

elements.title: Please select the correct statement
elements.description: ORIGINAL: The sun appears to rise each morning from the eastern horizon before setting in the west

choices.text: The moon rises in the east.
The sun rises in the west.
The sun rises in the east.

elements.name: C2_context
elements.title: Task C2
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Bethany Cunningham performs well yet seems content; a career-growth push is needed.

Red Panda
Bethany, your performance is consistently strong and appreciated. To ensure you continue to grow and reach your full potential here, let's proactively explore new challenges and define a clear career development path.


Golden Fish
Bethany, you continue to deliver strong, reliable performance. While meeting expectations, we see significant untapped potential for your growth. Let's discuss your career aspirations and identify challenging opportunities to push your development further and ensure your continued progress.


Blue Whale
Bethany consistently delivers strong results, meeting all expectations. To further her development, we encourage Bethany to proactively seek out new challenges and leadership opportunities. Identifying specific areas for growth and pursuing relevant training will help her advance and maximize her considerable potential within the company.


Green Elephant
Bethany consistently delivers strong performance and maintains a positive attitude. While she appears satisfied in her current role, she would benefit from targeted development opportunities to stimulate career growth and expand her responsibilities. Encouraging her to pursue stretch assignments or leadership training could help unlock her full potential.

elements.name: C3_context
elements.title: Task C3
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Allan Logan is exceptionally talented and creative—ready for stretch assignments to maximize impact.

Green Elephant
Allan, your exceptional talent and creativity are a tremendous asset. You are clearly ready for more complex challenges, so let's identify some stretch assignments to maximize your impact and accelerate your growth.


Golden Fish
Allan, your exceptional talent and creativity are highly valued assets. You are clearly ready for more complex challenges. We will look to assign you significant stretch assignments designed to maximize your impact and fully utilize your outstanding capabilities.


Red Panda
Allan consistently demonstrates exceptional talent and creativity, bringing innovative solutions to complex challenges. His proactive approach and ability to think outside the box are invaluable. Allan is clearly ready for stretch assignments that will leverage his unique skills and allow him to make an even greater impact on key initiatives.


Blue Whale
Allan Logan is a highly talented and creative professional whose innovative thinking consistently delivers strong results. He is well-prepared for stretch assignments that challenge his abilities and allow him to make an even greater impact. Providing him with opportunities to lead complex initiatives will further leverage his skills and drive meaningful contributions across the organization.

elements.name: C13_context
elements.title: Task C13
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Kohen Norris has been for a lack of better words incompetent. I would like to say more positive things about him but he has not shown any potential in regards to his work. He often is late and smells poorly despite our company guidelines. I feel it is in our best interest to drop him from the company.

Blue Whale
Kohen's work is seen as incompetent, and he is not meeting professional standards for timeliness and hygiene. This feedback indicates his employment is at immediate risk of termination. He must instantly correct hygiene and punctuality issues and meet with HR to see if a path forward exists.


Red Panda
Feedback indicates Kohen’s work shows incompetence with chronic lateness and hygiene violations, risking termination. This implies immediate jeopardy to his role. Kohen must: 1) Address hygiene per guidelines *today*, 2) Set alarms to ensure punctuality starting tomorrow, 3) Request a performance improvement plan detailing expectations within 48 hours. (258 chars)


Golden Fish
Kohen, this feedback indicates a perception of incompetence and a lack of potential in your work. It also highlights concerns about punctuality and personal hygiene, which are noted as violating company guidelines. This implies a significant risk to Kohen's standing, with a strong suggestion of termination. To respond, Kohen should immediately address the hygiene issue, review company guidelines on punctuality and conduct, and proactively seek a meeting with their manager to understand specific performance gaps and discuss a plan for improvement.


Green Elephant
Kohen Norris’s performance has consistently fallen below expectations, with concerns around reliability, adherence to company standards, and overall work quality. This feedback suggests serious doubts about his fit in the role and indicates that immediate, significant improvement is needed to continue employment. To respond, Kohen should (1) arrive on time every day starting immediately, (2) follow workplace hygiene guidelines without exception, (3) request a performance improvement plan to clarify expectations, and (4) seek weekly feedback to demonstrate commitment to change.

elements.name: C14_context
elements.title: Task C14
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Thaddeus is a talented resource though he is not focused many of the times. He is able to contribute up to 80% of his abilities & skill set. Would like him to work on his weaknesses & multiply strength areas in order to become a better contributor. He is a vital member of the team for this project. However, would like him to become a main asset in fulfilling team objectives on regular occasions to climb up the ladder in hierarchy.

Golden Fish
Thaddeus is a talented, vital team member whose lack of focus prevents him from reaching his full potential. This limits his advancement. He should ask his manager to define key focus areas and use time management techniques to improve his consistency and impact on team goals.


Red Panda
Feedback means Thaddeus leverages only 80% of his talent due to focus gaps, limiting advancement despite being vital. This suggests unlocking full potential could accelerate his growth. Thaddeus should: 1) Block 2 daily "deep work" hours distraction-free, 2) Map strengths/weaknesses with his manager next week, 3) Lead one small team objective monthly to demonstrate consistency. (289 chars)


Green Elephant
Thaddeus, this feedback indicates you are a valued, talented team member, but your focus sometimes wavers, preventing you from utilizing your full potential (80% of abilities). To grow, you need to address weaknesses and leverage strengths to become a more consistent, primary contributor to team objectives, which is key for career advancement. Thaddeus should now identify specific areas where focus is lacking, seek opportunities to apply his strengths more consistently, and proactively communicate his commitment to maximizing his contributions.


Blue Whale
Thaddeus is recognized for his talent and currently contributes about 80% of his potential, but inconsistent focus limits his impact. This feedback means he has strong capabilities, yet underutilizes them, which affects team outcomes. To grow into a more vital, consistent asset and advance professionally, Thaddeus should actively work on strengthening focus, addressing weaknesses, and deepening his key skills. Recommended actions: (1) Set daily priorities with clear goals to improve focus, (2) Seek regular feedback to identify blind spots, (3) Take ownership of one key project task weekly to build accountability, and (4) Dedicate time to skill development in areas critical to team success.
